subject: Re: pipinsurance.com.au
preview: Hi Allie,  Thanks for the assistance in getting the page sorted.  When I tried to go to pipinsurance.com.au, I am redirected to pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud.  Is there a way to fix it so this doesn't hap

full_threads.body:
Hi Allie,

Thanks for the assistance in getting the page sorted.

When I tried to go to pipinsurance.com.au, I am redirected to pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud.

Is there a way to fix it so this doesn't happen?

Thanks.

Sreetheran Nair | Technical Lead

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus P: 0863817102 E:Sreetheran.Nair@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi there Allie!

I hope you are super.

We would like to grant some of our team access to the new Pip site so that they can test but presently you need admin rights to access the page.

Would it be possible to make this accessible to someone with a lower level of access e.g. subscriber?

Please let us know.

Thanks a mil.

Hi Meg,

Thank you so much for confirming, glad to help, as always!

Just give me a shout if anything else comes up. Always here if you need a hand.

Perfect thank you so much, I am sure that is sufficient for now.

Much appreciated.

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au

Hi Megs,

Just a quick heads-up, we’ve made the updates and cleared the cache. You can check it out here:
https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/


Here’s what’s been updated:
  • Headline: “Something exciting is coming your way”
  • Subtext: “We’ve been working hard behind the scenes and can’t wait to show you what we’ve been up to. Get ready for a fresh new look and even better experiences.”
  • Social media icons removed, as requested

Let me know if everything looks good on your end, happy to tweak if needed!

Hi Megs,

Thank you for confirming and great to hear it’s showing up on your phone!

We’ll go ahead and update the messaging as you suggested:
  • Headline: “Something exciting is coming your way”
  • Subtext: “We’ve been working hard behind the scenes and can’t wait to show you what we’ve been up to. Get ready for a fresh new look and even better experiences.”
  • We’ll also remove the social media icons as requested.

I'll send through a quick confirmation once its live.

Thank you so much and always happy to help.

Thanks Allie.

I can see the change on my phone 🙂 Must be caching on my machine still.

Instead of "Website is under maintenance"
Can you say -
"Something exciting is coming your way"

And instead of "We are doing some maintenance on our website to improve your experience. Meanwhile, follow us on Social Media"
Can you do -
"We've been working hard behind the scenes and can't wait to show you what we've been up to. Get ready for a fresh new look and even better experiences."

Please remove the social icons.

Thanks a mil,

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au

Hey Megs,

Thanks you so much for letting us know!

We’ve just checked both URLs in an incognito window, and here’s how they’re looking on our end:

If it’s still not showing up for you, feel free to give us a shout, we’re more than happy to clear the cache again, just in case 😊

Thanks you so much! Always happy to help.

Thanks for the speedy assistance.
I have cleared my cache and can't see the changes, could you clear server cache?

I have tried with both URLs
https://pipinsurance.com.au/
https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/

Thanks a mil!

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus

Hi Megs,

Thank you so much for letting us know.

Just a quick update, we’ve made some changes to the page here:
https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/

When you have a moment, feel free to take a look and let us know if it’s what you had in mind. Happy to tweak anything to get it just right.

Looking forward to your thoughts!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi there Allie!

We would prefer people aren't able to see the contents of the site itself, is there a way to set up something like the below? I can only set up a page like:
https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/maintenance/

But what we are wanting is more like the below (which prevents you accessing the site).

(Ignore the sign up for updates button and the social links)


Please let us know if this is possible and what we would need to supply you.

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
